sentence.Network_en: The camshaft rotates in phase with the crankshaft, but at half its speed.
sentence.Network_cn: 凸轮轴和曲轴协调旋转, 但速度仅是曲轴的一半.

sentence.Network_en: Since 1958, an engine with a single overhead camshaft has been used.
sentence.Network_cn: 从1958年起, 便已使用带有单顶置凸轮机的发动机.

sentence.Network_en: In the engine, oil is supplied to crankshaft and camshaft journals rotating in their supporting bearings.
sentence.Network_cn: 在发动机里, 机油被供应到旋转在其支承轴内的曲轴和凸轮轴轴颈上.

entry.def: A camshaft is a rod in an engine and works to change circular motion into motion up and down or from side to side.

auth_sentence.content: Decouple the camshaft from the valves, and combustion halts.
auth_sentence.res_content: Decouple the camshaft from the valves, and combustion halts.
